title: Wing Tutoring
text:

title: Wing Tutoring
text:
About


Wing Tutoring began with a simple mission: to help students find their voice and confidence in a world full of pressure and noise.
Founded by Alyssa Wing, a lifelong educator and advocate for student growth, our programs focus on individual strengths. Whether you’re writing college essays, preparing for tests, or exploring new subjects, we walk with you — every step of the way.
What makes us different? We listen. We tailor. We care.

title: Services
text:
✍️ College Essay Program
Not sure where to start? Feeling overwhelmed by the writing process?
This program takes students through the full cycle of writing — from understanding the prompt, to brainstorming, drafting, revising, and publishing. If you need support through the entirety of the writing process, this is for you!
I’ll serve as your writing coach — helping you unlock and tell your story every step of the way.
Covers: - Personal Statement
- UC Essays
- Supplemental Essays
- Scholarship Essays
💰 Price: Begins at $700
All packages will be assessed based on individual need



⏱️ Essay Express Program
This program offers a limited amount of support and is designed to target specific areas of the writing process.
Ideal for students who have already started writing or have a draft.
💰 Price: Begins at $350
All packages will be assessed based on individual need



🧩 À La Carte Services

Hourly Tutoring Rate

Essay Revision / Editing

1:1 Coaching, charged in 30-minute increments


📬 Contact: alyssawingtutoring@gmail.com
